name: Aim Champ - FPS Aim Trainer
description:
Aim Champ is an aim training tool for mobile FPS games. It features many effective training tasks to improve your aiming skills, and is compatible with most of the popular FPS games on the market.

There are nearly 30 training tasks to choose from, which will all help you improve different areas of your aiming skill. All of the tasks are highly customizable - from the size and position of the target to the game speed.

The settings are also highly customizable, and is designed to be compatible with most of the popular Mobile FPS game titles on the market.

Start practicing your aim today - and become a human AimBot!

Features:
- Various training tasks to choose from (Nearly 20! )
- Tasks designed specifically to improve different aspects of your aim
- Compatibility with most of the popular FPS game titles
- Highly customizable training tasks
- Save your favorite customized task
- Highly customizable settings
- Aim Acceleration
- Challenge the world with the Leaderboard feature
- Share your training results immediately with the Share tool
- Intuitive UI and simple controls
And more to come - Leave us a review and stay tuned for additional features!
